description:
The best free epic games you can play:

• Fortnite - This popular battle royale shooter is free to play on the Epic Games Store. It features cross-platform play and regular updates with new seasons, weapons and skins.

• Rocket League - This car soccer game has fun, fast-paced gameplay and consistently ranks among the most-played games on Epic. The game recently became free to play and has a huge player base.

Also read : How to play knockout Rocket League?

• League of Legends - This MOBA (multiplayer online battle arena) game is one of the most popular free games of all time. It has a complex meta but is easy to learn the basics.

• Path of Exile - This online action RPG is a great free alternative to Diablo. It has deep character customization, challenging gameplay and regular content updates.

• Genshin Impact - This open world action RPG features gorgeous anime style visuals and large map to explore. The game features gacha style character upgrades but the main quests are free.

• Dauntless - This free to play action RPG serves as a good alternative to games like Monster Hunter. You hunt giant beasts with different weapons and upgrade gear.

Those are a few of the best free games currently offered on the Epic Games Store.
name: epic games
